name: politico
text:

text: ‚ÄúWe have a policy against using seller-specific data to aid our private label business. I can‚Äôt guarantee you that that policy has never been violated,‚Äù Bezos replied to questions from Rep. Pramila Jayapal (D-Wash.), whose district includes Amazon HQ https://t.co/K2nEYaMmuf

name: politico
text:

text:
